snippet.title: Army of Squirrels launch trailer
snippet.description:
We are coming soon on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/793260/Army_of_Squirrels/

Release date 27.2.2018

Army of Squirrels is turn based strategy game with puzzles. It is new kind of combination of conquering and defending with event card mechanism. Game is about apocalyptic war between forest destroying robots and underdog squirrels who bravely makes a stand for their sacred homeland. 

It is a single player game where you control squirrels through surprisely changing environment and confront evil human leaders. With the help of squirrel heroes special abilities there's a tons of tactics to try out.
